document.full_text: the massive earthquake that forced the closure of four nuclear power plants in japan has highlighted the grave risk of inadequate back-up generators at u.s. facilities, a leading u.s. scientist group said on friday.
document.title: scientists say japan quake shows us nuclear risk
lines_and_colors: the massive earthquake that forced the closure of four nuclear power plants in japan has highlighted the grave risk of inadequate back-up generators at u.s. facilities, a leading u.s. scientist group said on friday.
